extendedInfo.description: The SG Deal Aggregator(Singapore) is designed to provide fast/simple browse of deals from Singapore group buy site. The newly added in sms function allows you to share deals conveniently with your friends. Unlike other aggregator site, we believe, a free application should provide everything free under no condition so we dun require any sign up information, we dun provide any advertisement, we will not ask you to sign up any news letters. As a user, i know those things are irritating. We are direct, straight to the point, show you the deals. And of course, the speed is breathtakingly fast.bigdeal.sg groupon.sgjigocity,voucherWOWStreetDealAllthedeals.sgsuperdealsJuz browse it to experience fast and simple user face to get the latest deal. Also for PC versions, you can go to http://www.jppjff.comother mobile phone platforms could also use www.jppjff.com to access the online version of this application.

reviews.title: Horrible UI
reviews.comment: Can\'t go back from the detailed page. Do not auto scroll to the previous item.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Big room for improvement
reviews.comment: After going to the site, pressing back nor any other buttons allow me to go back to the list of deals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Useless or just too complicated to be useful.
reviews.author: Blaqbone Palangi

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Good summary of all the major players in Singapore. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User
